name: SONAX Car Wash Shampoo Concentrate 314300 | High-Foaming pH-Neutral Formula for Effective Cleaning | Safe on All Paint Wax Sealants & Coatings | Removes Dirt Grime and Road Film | 1L (33.3oz)
short_description: SAFE & EFFECTIVE - Sonax Car Wash Shampoo Concentrate is a highly effective, phosphate free, biodegradable formula that penetrates and loosens tough dirt and grime without damaging or stripping protective wax and sealant layers
PH BALANCED - Sonax Car Wash Shampoo Concentrate is a powerful pH neutral formula safe for all finishes and car surfaces and will not harm existing waxes, sealants or ceramic coatings.
THICK FOAMING ACTION - Thick lathering foam action that rinses clean, leaving no water spotting or streaking - only a brilliantly clean, glossy smooth paint surface every time
ADHERES TO DIRT & GRIME - Special anionic surfactants adhere to dirt particles and act as emulsifiers absorbing and dissolving oil droplets for a cleaner surface
Sonax suggests a 2-bucket wash system for best results - Can also be used in a foam gun, foam cannon, or power washer systems

name: Nanoskin BUBBLE BATH Foaming Car Wash Shampoo 5 Gallons - Works with Foam Cannon, Foam Gun, Bucket Washes, Car Soap for Pressure Washer | For Car, Truck, Motorcycle, RV & More | Green Apple Scented
short_description: ✅ HIGHLY CONCENTRATED CAR SHAMPOO: With a dilution ratio of up to 127:1, simply add 5 ounces of Bubble Bath to a 5-gallon wash bucket or a 32 oz. solution tank for a foam cannon or foam gun. This car wash soap produces thick, lubricating suds that help safely lift dirt, grime, and road contaminants during routine car washing and detailing.

✅ SAFE ON EXTERIOR VEHICLE SURFACES: Formulated with advanced cleaners and surfactants, this car soap delivers rich, consistent foam while remaining gentle on paint, rubber, vinyl, glass, and plastic trim. Ideal for maintaining finishes as part of a complete car care routine without drying or damaging exterior components.

✅ pH BALANCED FOR PAINT PROTECTION: This pH-neutral car cleaner effectively removes loose contaminants while helping preserve existing waxes, sealants, and ceramic coatings. The non-streaking formula supports a clean, bright finish and is suitable for professional car detailing and everyday maintenance.

✅ BIODEGRADABLE & ECONOMICAL FORMULA: Bubble Bath features a biodegradable, phosphate-free blend of detergents, emulsifiers, and foam boosters. Its concentrated design makes it a cost-effective addition to any car cleaning supplies, car wash kit, or carwash kit set.

✅ EASY TO USE FOR ALL SKILL LEVELS: Stable foam provides excellent coverage and proper dwell time, making it beginner-friendly while meeting the demands of professional detailers. Gentle on clear coat, polished metals, glass, and trim, it’s a dependable solution for any detailing kit, car care kit, or car cleaner kit.
product_description: BUBBLE BATH is a thick, super-concentrated, high-foaming car wash soap formulated for effective and efficient vehicle cleaning. Designed for both hand washing and automatic car wash systems, this car shampoo delivers rich foam that helps lift and rinse away dirt, road film, and grime while promoting excellent water sheeting for a clean, streak-free finish. This high-performance car soap rinses clean without leaving residue, making it a reliable choice for routine car wash maintenance and professional detailing workflows. Its concentrated formula is cost-effective, environmentally friendly, and ideal for use in a complete car care routine alongside other car cleaning supplies and detailing supplies. BUBBLE BATH works well as part of a car washing kit, car wash kit, or carwash kit set, supporting consistent results for enthusiasts and professional detailers alike. Whether used in a detailing kit, car care kit, or general car cleaner kit, it provides dependable cleaning performance for exterior surfaces as part of regular car cleaning and car detailing processes. Dilution & Usage Guidelines: 1. General Dilution: 1 oz per gallon of water 2. Hand Wash: Dilute 1 oz of BUBBLE BATH per 1 gallon of water 3. Automatic Car Wash Systems: Dilute 1 gallon of BUBBLE BATH to 10 gallons of water, then adjust the metering system for optimal foam and cleaning performance. Suitable for use on vehicle exteriors as part of routine car care, BUBBLE BATH is a practical, versatile car cleaner solution that supports clean results without unnecessary additives.

name: Swift Touchless Car Wash Shampoo (1 Gallon) - No Brushing Required, High Foaming Car Soap, Heavy Duty, Auto Detergent for Foam Cannon, Works on Cars, Trucks, RVs, Upholstery & More!
short_description: ✅NO BRUSHING REQUIRED : Touchless Shampoo produces thick white foam that was designed to safely degrease and dissolve heavy dirt and grime from cars, trucks, SUVs, trailers, RVs, motorcycles, industrial equipment, & even upholstery with no need to use a wash mitt or brush!

✅SUPER EASY TO USE : Simply fill your foam cannon with Touchless Shampoo, spray entire dry vehicle with foam, wait 2-3 minutes for the product to activate before pressure washing away, and done! Save time and labor by not having to wipe, scrub, or brush!

✅BIODEGRADABLE CONCENTRATION BALANCE : No need to worry about the right dilution ratio! Formulated with alkaline concentration and traffic film remover, Touchless Shampoo is ready to use as is, with no dilution necessary!

✅SAFE ON ALL SURFACES : Touchless detergent is safe on all exterior vehicle surfaces such as paint, plastic, rubber, chrome, glass, and is also safe on ceramic-coated, wrapped, & paint protection-filmed vehicles!

✅SAVE TIME AND LABOR : Achieve a squeaky-clean vehicle in just a few minutes! Allow Touchless detergent to clean the hard-to-reach areas for you! One gallon of detergent can wash up to 10 vehicles depending on vehicle type.
product_description: Touchless Car Wash Shampoo by Swift Auto Care was designed to deeply clean your vehicle without having to brush, scrub, or wipe after application, saving your time and hard labor! Producing a highly concentrated and biodegradable thick foam through a foam cannon, Touchless Shampoo will dissolve heavy dirt and grime without harming any vehicle surface, leaving behind a shiny and protected finish! Formulated to be used as received, with no dilution necessary, simply fill your foam cannon with the desired amount of detergent, and cover entire dry vehicle in foam. Allow the foam to activate and dissolve dirt for 2-3 minutes before pressure washing away. Wash Cars, Trucks, Trailers, Buses, Trains, Wagons, ATV's, UTV's, off-road vehicles or any Industrial Equipment safely and efficiently with Touchless Shampoo. Also suitable to safely clean interior vehicle carpets and upholstery using a vacuum extractor, and even household equipment such as kitchen appliances, grills, driveways & more! Proudly made in the USA!
